sentences.english: This plush pub-dog is a new product.
sentences.chinese: 這隻長毛絨獅淘寶如何取消訂單子狗是新產品。

sentences.english: Welcome To Our Chow Chow Kennel.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎走近我們的鬆獅犬舍。

sentences.english: Lion Peak Mountain Longjing Longjing tea in the top grade.
sentences.chinese: 獅峯山上的龍井爲龍井茶中之上品。

sentences.english: Where to sell purebred chow ah?
These Are Our Champion Chow Chow.
sentences.chinese: 以下是我們的冠軍登陸鬆獅。

sentences.english: This paper mainly studied the sluice pier of HeMianShi hydroelectric station.
sentences.chinese: 本文是以合面獅水電站大壩的溢流壩閘墩爲研究對象。

sentences.english: A chow chow named Cody is groomed before the show on Feb. 13.
sentences.chinese: 一個名爲鬆獅扶植科迪是2月13日之前的表演。

sentences.english: With the top prize going to an 8 - year - old chow-chow named "Chuckie" .
sentences.chinese: 一直8歲大名叫楚克的鬆獅犬獲得了最高獎。

sentences.english: Of course, the members of my family, also a lovely dog, named SongSong.
sentences.chinese: 當然，我們家的成員，還有一隻可愛的鬆獅。

sentences.english: An army of sheep led by a lion would defeat an army of lions led by a sheep.
sentences.chinese: 雄師率領的一羣羊可以打敗綿羊帶領的一夥獅。

sentences.english: I was in Beijing Zoo in Beijing in Febrary, 1992.
sentences.chinese: 1992年2月，我在北京動物園獅虎山前留影。

sentences.english: My girlfriend would like one dog, especially Chow Chow.
sentences.chinese: 我女朋友很想要只狗，尤其是鬆獅犬。

sentences.english: An Asiatic lion dozes in the sun at the Zurich Zoo in Switzerland.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士蘇黎世動物園，一隻亞洲獅正在陽光下午休。
好的鬆獅犬舍在哪裏啊？

sentences.english: With the top prize going to an eight - year - old chow-chow named "Chuckie".
sentences.chinese: 最終，一隻名叫查克的鬆獅犬摘得了最高獎項。

sentences.english: The argument that the lion totemism exists in Dai minority area is worth discussing.
sentences.chinese: 傣族地區存在獅圖騰崇拜的說法是值得商榷的。
